verses.verse: וַיָּבֹ֤אוּ <S%H935><s%> came הַזִּפִים֙ <S%H2130><s%> And the Ziphites אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> unto Saul הַגִּבְעָ֖תָה <S%H1390><s%> to Gibeah לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying הֲל֨וֹא <S%H3808><s%> is not דָוִ֤ד <S%H1732><s%> Doth not David מִסְתַּתֵּר֙ <S%H5641><s%> hide בְּגִבְעַ֣ת <S%H1389><s%> himself in the hill הַחֲכִילָ֔ה <S%H2444><s%> of Hachilah עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> above פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> [which is] before הַיְשִׁימֹֽן׃ <S%H3452><s%> desert

וַיָּ֣קָם <S%H6965><s%> arose שָׁא֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> Then Saul וַיֵּ֙רֶד֙ <S%H3381><s%> and went down אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מִדְבַּר־ <S%H4057><s%> to the wilderness זִ֔יף <S%H2128><s%> of Ziph וְאִתּ֛וֹ <S%H854><s%> for שְׁלֹֽשֶׁת־ <S%H7969><s%> having three אֲלָפִ֥ים <S%H505><s%> thousand אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men בְּחוּרֵ֣י <S%H970><s%> young יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְבַקֵּ֥שׁ <S%H1245><s%> with him to seek אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> David בְּמִדְבַּר־ <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness זִֽיף׃ <S%H2128><s%> of Ziph

וַיִּ֨חַן <S%H2583><s%> pitched שָׁא֜וּל <S%H7586><s%> And Saul בְּגִבְעַ֣ת <S%H1389><s%> in the hill הַחֲכִילָ֗ה <S%H2444><s%> of Hachilah אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> beside פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> which [is] before הַיְשִׁימֹ֖ן <S%H3452><s%> Jeshimon עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> beside הַדָּ֑רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> by the way וְדָוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> But David יֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> abode בַּמִּדְבָּ֔ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness וַיַּ֕רְא <S%H7200><s%> and he saw כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for בָ֥א <S%H935><s%> came שָׁא֛וּל <S%H7586><s%> that Saul אַחֲרָ֖יו <S%H310><s%> after הַמִּדְבָּֽרָה׃ <S%H4057><s%> him into the wilderness

וַיִּשְׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> therefore sent out דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> David מְרַגְּלִ֑ים <S%H7270><s%> spies וַיֵּ֕דַע <S%H3045><s%> and understood כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for בָ֥א <S%H935><s%> was come שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> that Saul אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about נָכֽוֹן׃ <S%H3559><s%> in very deed

וַיָּ֣קָם <S%H6965><s%> arose דָּוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> And David וַיָּבֹא֮ <S%H935><s%> and came אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמָּקוֹם֮ <S%H4725><s%> to the place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after חָנָה־ <S%H2583><s%> had pitched שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> in it שָׁאוּל֒ <S%H7586><s%> where Saul וַיַּ֣רְא <S%H7200><s%> beheld דָּוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> and David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמָּקוֹם֙ <S%H4725><s%> the place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after שָֽׁכַב־ <S%H7901><s%> lay שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> in it שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> where Saul וְאַבְנֵ֥ר <S%H74><s%> and Abner בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נֵ֖ר <S%H5369><s%> of Ner שַׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> the captain צְבָא֑וֹ <S%H6635><s%> of his host וְשָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> and Saul שֹׁכֵ֣ב <S%H7901><s%> lay בַּמַּעְגָּ֔ל <S%H4570><s%> in the trench וְהָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> and the people חֹנִ֥ים <S%H2583><s%> pitched [סְבִיבֹתֹו כ] (סְבִיבֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H5439><s%> place ק)

וַיַּ֨עַן <S%H6030><s%> Then answered דָּוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> David וַיֹּ֣אמֶר ׀ <S%H559><s%> and said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֲחִימֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H288><s%> to Ahimelech הַחִתִּ֗י <S%H2850><s%> the Hittite וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to אֲבִישַׁ֨י <S%H52><s%> and to Abishai בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son צְרוּיָ֜ה <S%H6870><s%> of Zeruiah אֲחִ֤י <S%H251><s%> brother יוֹאָב֙ <S%H3097><s%> to Joab לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who יֵרֵ֥ד <S%H3381><s%> Who will go down אִתִּ֛י <S%H854><s%> for אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> with me to Saul אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <S%H4264><s%> army וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֲבִישַׁ֔י <S%H52><s%> Abishai אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I אֵרֵ֥ד <S%H3381><s%> I will go down עִמָּֽךְ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with

וַיָּבֹא֩ <S%H935><s%> came דָוִ֨ד <S%H1732><s%> So David וַאֲבִישַׁ֥י ׀ <S%H52><s%> and Abishai אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעָם֮ <S%H5971><s%> to the people לַיְלָה֒ <S%H3915><s%> by night וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold שָׁא֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> and behold Saul שֹׁכֵ֤ב <S%H7901><s%> lay יָשֵׁן֙ <S%H3463><s%> sleeping בַּמַּעְגָּ֔ל <S%H4570><s%> within the trench וַחֲנִית֥וֹ <S%H2595><s%> and his spear מְעוּכָֽה־ <S%H4600><s%> stuck בָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the ground [מְרַאֲשֹׁתֹו כ] (מְרַאֲשֹׁתָ֑יו <S%H4763><s%> bolster ק) וְאַבְנֵ֣ר <S%H74><s%> but Abner וְהָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> and the people שֹׁכְבִ֖ים <S%H7901><s%> lay [סְבִיבֹתֹו כ] (סְבִיבֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H5439><s%> place ק) ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said אֲבִישַׁי֙ <S%H52><s%> Abishai אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> to David סִגַּ֨ר <S%H5462><s%> hath delivered אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> God הַיּ֛וֹם <S%H3117><s%> this day אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אוֹיִבְךָ֖ <S%H341><s%> thine enemy בְּיָדֶ֑ךָ <S%H3027><s%> into thine hand וְעַתָּה֩ <S%H6258><s%> now אַכֶּ֨נּוּ <S%H5221><s%> now therefore let me smite נָ֜א <S%H4994><s%> please בַּחֲנִ֤ית <S%H2595><s%> him I pray thee with the spear וּבָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> even to the earth פַּ֣עַם <S%H6471><s%> stroke אַחַ֔ת <S%H259><s%> one וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not אֶשְׁנֶ֖ה <S%H8138><s%> and I will not [smite] him the second time לֽוֹ׃

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> And David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֲבִישַׁ֖י <S%H52><s%> to Abishai אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּשְׁחִיתֵ֑הוּ <S%H7843><s%> Destroy כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> for מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> who שָׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> him not for who can stretch forth יָד֛וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand בִּמְשִׁ֥יחַ <S%H4899><s%> anointed יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD'S וְנִקָּֽה׃ <S%H5352><s%> and be guiltless פ

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> David חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> liveth יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> furthermore [As] the LORD כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD יִגָּפֶ֑נּוּ <S%H5062><s%> shall smite אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or יוֹמ֤וֹ <S%H3117><s%> him or his day יָבוֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> shall come וָמֵ֔ת <S%H4191><s%> to die א֧וֹ <S%H176><s%> or בַמִּלְחָמָ֛ה <S%H4421><s%> into battle יֵרֵ֖ד <S%H3381><s%> or he shall descend וְנִסְפָּֽה׃ <S%H5595><s%> and perish

חָלִ֤ילָה <S%H2486><s%> forbid לִּי֙ מֵֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD מִשְּׁלֹ֥חַ <S%H7971><s%> that I should stretch forth יָדִ֖י <S%H3027><s%> mine hand בִּמְשִׁ֣יחַ <S%H4899><s%> anointed יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD'S וְ֠עַתָּה <S%H6258><s%> now קַח־ <S%H3947><s%> but I pray thee take נָ֨א <S%H4994><s%> please אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֲנִ֜ית <S%H2595><s%> thou now the spear אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> after [מְרַאֲשֹׁתֹו כ] (מְרַאֲשֹׁתָ֛יו <S%H4763><s%> bolster ק) וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צַפַּ֥חַת <S%H6835><s%> and the cruse הַמַּ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> of water וְנֵ֥לֲכָה <S%H1980><s%> go לָּֽנוּ׃

וַיִּקַּח֩ <S%H3947><s%> took דָּוִ֨ד <S%H1732><s%> So David אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֲנִ֜ית <S%H2595><s%> the spear וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צַפַּ֤חַת <S%H6835><s%> and the cruse הַמַּ֙יִם֙ <S%H4325><s%> of water מֵרַאֲשֹׁתֵ֣י <S%H7226><s%> bolster שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> from Saul's וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> went לָהֶ֑ם וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> no רֹאֶה֩ <S%H7200><s%> and no man saw וְאֵ֨ין <S%H369><s%> one יוֹדֵ֜עַ <S%H3045><s%> [it] nor knew וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> nor מֵקִ֗יץ <S%H6974><s%> [it] neither awaked כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> because כֻלָּם֙ <S%H3605><s%> were all יְשֵׁנִ֔ים <S%H3462><s%> grow old כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> because תַּרְדֵּמַ֣ת <S%H8639><s%> because a deep sleep יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> from the LORD נָפְלָ֖ה <S%H5307><s%> was fallen עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

וַיַּעֲבֹ֤ר <S%H5674><s%> went over דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> Then David הָעֵ֔בֶר <S%H5676><s%> to the other side וַיַּעֲמֹ֥ד <S%H5975><s%> and stood עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רֹאשׁ־ <S%H7218><s%> on the top הָהָ֖ר <S%H2022><s%> of an hill מֵֽרָחֹ֑ק <S%H7350><s%> afar off רַ֥ב <S%H7227><s%> a great הַמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> space בֵּינֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H996><s%> between

וַיִּקְרָ֨א <S%H7121><s%> cried דָוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> And David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> to the people וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to אַבְנֵ֤ר <S%H74><s%> and to Abner בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נֵר֙ <S%H5369><s%> of Ner לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying הֲל֥וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not תַעֲנֶ֖ה <S%H6030><s%> Answerest אַבְנֵ֑ר <S%H74><s%> Abner וַיַּ֤עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered אַבְנֵר֙ <S%H74><s%> Abner וַיֹּ֔אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> Who אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> who קָרָ֥אתָ <S%H7121><s%> Who [art] thou [that] criest אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> king פ

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִ֨ד <S%H1732><s%> And David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַבְנֵ֜ר <S%H74><s%> to Abner הֲלוֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> he אַתָּ֗ה <S%H859><s%> you וּמִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> any כָמ֙וֹךָ֙ <S%H3644><s%> is like בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel וְלָ֙מָּה֙ <S%H4100><s%> how long לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not שָׁמַ֔רְתָּ <S%H8104><s%> guarded אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֲדֹנֶ֖יךָ <S%H113><s%> thy lord הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for בָא֙ <S%H935><s%> came אַחַ֣ד <S%H259><s%> one הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people לְהַשְׁחִ֖ית <S%H7843><s%> in to destroy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king אֲדֹנֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H113><s%> thy lord

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> is not ט֞וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [is] not good הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> This thing הַזֶּה֮ <S%H2088><s%> This אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> because עָשִׂיתָ֒ <S%H6213><s%> that thou hast done חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> liveth יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> [As] the LORD כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> surely בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> ye [are] worthy מָ֙וֶת֙ <S%H4194><s%> to die אַתֶּ֔ם <S%H859><s%> you אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> because לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not שְׁמַרְתֶּ֛ם <S%H8104><s%> because ye have not kept עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and אֲדֹנֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H113><s%> your master עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and מְשִׁ֣יחַ <S%H4899><s%> anointed יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD'S וְעַתָּ֣ה ׀ <S%H6258><s%> and now רְאֵ֗ה <S%H7200><s%> And now see אֵֽי־ <S%H335><s%> where חֲנִ֥ית <S%H2595><s%> spear הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> where the king's וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צַפַּ֥חַת <S%H6835><s%> [is] and the cruse הַמַּ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> of water אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> because [מְרַאֲשֹׁתֹו כ] (מְרַאֲשֹׁתָֽיו׃ <S%H4763><s%> bolster ק)

וַיַּכֵּ֤ר <S%H5234><s%> knew שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> And Saul אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> voice דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> David's וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said הֲקוֹלְךָ֥ <S%H6963><s%> [Is] this thy voice זֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> is this בְּנִ֣י <S%H1121><s%> my son דָוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> David's וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> David's קוֹלִ֖י <S%H6963><s%> [It is] my voice אֲדֹנִ֥י <S%H113><s%> my lord הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> O king
